price: 25. Behalve degenen die geloven en goede daden verrichten, voor hen is er een beloning welke nooit zal eindigen.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
